content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5), boiler (position -21.5, 28.0), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0.0, 0.0) and a furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, 5.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, 5.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position ) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when trying to get an entity that does not exist at the specified position
- Double-check the position coordinates when trying to retrieve an entity. Ensure that the entity type exists at that location.

### Errors when placing pipes overlapping with water
- Ensure that the position where you intend to place the pipe is not overlapping with water. Look for alternate positions that are free of water.
